entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Winchester
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:38 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.9°C

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 06:42 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain with snow changing to snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 06:42 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 06:42 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
